channel.title: Help me to find the soundtrack
channel.description: I saw this video on the steam community hub [url]https://youtu.be/lZji8CScSyY?t=20s[/url] and was wondering if anyone can tell me the name of the first song. It starts at about 00:00:20.

item.title: Help me to find the soundtrack
item.dc:creator: rexmorgan
item.description:
My favorite now is the songs of John Legend. But I don’t insist you try lisening to it. However, joblessness hurts, even more than spending much of your days in a cubicle. Stay away from doing any of these things while you’re in your office tomb and “The Man” will not fire you.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me to find the soundtrack

item.title: Help me to find the soundtrack
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
Scorpion42:

How come?!

Legal issues as to who owns what being such a minefield in these situations that they’ve decided not to risk it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me to find the soundtrack
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
https://web.archive.org/web/20120501132051/https://www.blackmesasource.com/community_project12.html

If you want to see the rest of the competitions you can see them here:
https://web.archive.org/web/20120502024346/https://www.blackmesasource.com/community.html

A lot of them are actually in the game except the music.

Edit: I guess I should say were in the game. They can’t put them into the commercial version.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me to find the soundtrack

item.title: Help me to find the soundtrack
item.dc:creator: Joe_chief
item.description:
Swaggless:

https://beemp3s.org/index.php?q=cp12

Ta daaa! Enjoy.

Wow I thought they were all lost forever. I was wondering from where text got the soundtracks for his mod.

What happened to all this fan projects anyways? Were some meant to be included in the game? I remember seeing this video of a guy complaining that his computer screen texture was not included in the game.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me to find the soundtrack

item.title: Help me to find the soundtrack
item.dc:creator: Swaggless
item.description:
Scorpion42:

This is kinda related to the thread title: Before the release of BM, you could access the old community projects, one of which was a soundtrack contest. Now you can’t, but do you know, where they are now? There were some really good tracks, Baron Land springs to mind…

https://beemp3s.org/index.php?q=cp12

Ta daaa! Enjoy.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me to find the soundtrack

item.title: Help me to find the soundtrack
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
Bernd:

I saw this video on the steam community hub https://youtu.be/lZji8CScSyY?t=20s and was wondering if anyone can tell me the name of the first song. It starts at about 00:00:20.

You didn’t bother reading the description did you?

Songlist in Order:
Nuclear Mission Jam - Kelly Bailey (Half Life)
Hazardous Enviroments - Kelly Bailey (Half Life)
Upright Kangaroo - Michael Paradinas & Richard D. James (Expert Knob Twiddlers, Mike & Rich)
Silent Hill 2 Dog Music
Blooba Doop Scooba - Danny Baranowsky (Basement Collection)
Super Mario 64 Main Theme - Koji Kondo
Melo, sashi kaetatto - Toshiro Masuda (Excel Saga OST)
Soryaamou - Toshiro Masuda (Excel Saga OST)
Too Drunk to Fuck - Dead Kennedy’s
Bravery - Satoru Kosaki (Nisemonogatari OST)

Also, how can you not know Nuclear Mission Jam?

Read full topic
item.source: Help me to find the soundtrack
